item.title: Retrospective on First Term
item.description: I write this entry at about 0230 in the morning on the 27th of June, 2024. Tomorrow, at 1400, I am to join BMA. I joined BMA on 20th December 2023. This leave marked the end of my first term and the commencement of my second. A lot can be written about the way my pattern of thought has changed over the last 6 months, but I won’t dwell too much on it.
